section.p: Note that a Processor might be a Third Party Administrator or a PBM. For the purposes of claims processing, we do not need to distinguish these.

ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] bankIdNumber with data type String
Contains exactly one [1..1] planId with data type String
Contains exactly one [1..1] processorControlNumber with data type String
Contains zero or one [0..1] payer, where its type is Payer

Contains exactly one [1..1] processorControlNumber with data type String
Contains zero or one [0..1] payer, where its type is Payer
